title: Update LandingPage feature text from ICP wallet to ICP Identity

requirements.summary: Replace the specified Bulgarian sentence in the “Влез анонимно” feature card without changing any other content, styling, layout, or behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` no longer contains the exact substring “Достъп с ICP wallet, без имейл и без регистрация”.
`frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx` contains the exact substring “Достъп с ICP Identity, без имейл и без регистрация” in the same location (the “Влез анонимно” feature card).

file_operations.description: In the Features section, update only the paragraph text under the “Влез анонимно” card by replacing “Достъп с ICP wallet, без имейл и без регистрация” with “Достъп с ICP Identity, без имейл и без регистрация”, leaving all other text, styling, layout, and behavior unchanged.
